name: Brain Bricks
description:
What is Brain Bricks?
It's a new game for the C64. Designed, and devised by Daimansion.

It's a brick puzzle game. Remember different layouts and build them from your memory. Brain Jogging for the C64 :)

Contributors:
Daimansion: idea, graphic, testing, level design, bug hunt, disk creation
Endurion: coding
ZeHa: awesome music and tips
Testing: C64_80er, Ben, CapFuture1975, war64burnout, SID-Spieler, Michael, Dirk Vroomen, dragon, aitsch and green.

Thank you for your bug hunt and the stages you contributed!

Disk:
For those who want a real disk version, contact Daimansion via email from her home page:

http://www.daimansion.de/games.html
